parameters.query:
SELECT
  cs.*,
  c.full_name AS contact_name,
  c.whatsapp AS contact_whatsapp,
  ls.total_score AS anum_score
FROM corev4_calendar_settings cs
CROSS JOIN corev4_contacts c
LEFT JOIN corev4_lead_state ls ON ls.contact_id = c.id
WHERE cs.company_id = $1
  AND c.id = $2
  AND cs.is_active = true

-- Buscar reuniões já agendadas no período (do banco local)
SELECT
  meeting_date AS start_time,
  meeting_end_date AS end_time,
  meeting_duration_minutes
FROM corev4_scheduled_meetings
WHERE company_id = $1
  AND status IN ('scheduled', 'confirmed')
  AND meeting_date >= $2::timestamptz
  AND meeting_date <= $3::timestamptz
ORDER BY meeting_date ASC

-- Cancelar ofertas anteriores
SELECT cancel_previous_slot_offers($1, 'new_offer_created') AS cancelled_count;

-- Inserir nova oferta
INSERT INTO corev4_pending_slot_offers (
  contact_id,
  company_id,
  slot_1_datetime,
  slot_1_label,
  slot_2_datetime,
  slot_2_label,
  slot_3_datetime,
  slot_3_label,
  slot_4_datetime,
  slot_4_label,
  slot_5_datetime,
  slot_5_label,
  offer_timezone,
  offer_message_sent,
  anum_score_at_offer,
  expires_at,
  status
) VALUES (
  $1,
  $2,
  $3::timestamptz,
  $4,
  $5::timestamptz,
  $6,
  $7::timestamptz,
  $8,
  $9::timestamptz,
  $10,
  $11::timestamptz,
  $12,
  $13,
  $14,
  $15,
  NOW() + INTERVAL '24 hours',
  'pending'
)
RETURNING id AS offer_id, expires_at

options.queryReplacement:
={{ [
  $json.contact.id,
  $json.company_id,
  $json.slots[0]?.datetime || null,
  $json.slots[0]?.label || null,
  $json.slots[1]?.datetime || null,
  $json.slots[1]?.label || null,
  $json.slots[2]?.datetime || null,
  $json.slots[2]?.label || null,
  $json.slots[3]?.datetime || null,
  $json.slots[3]?.label || null,
  $json.slots[4]?.datetime || null,
  $json.slots[4]?.label || null,
  $json.settings.timezone,
  $json.offer_message,
  $json.contact.anum_score || 0
] }}

parameters.query:
-- Atualizar estado da conversa
SELECT update_conversation_state(
  $1, -- contact_id
  $2, -- company_id
  'awaiting_slot_selection',
  $3, -- pending_offer_id
  $4::jsonb -- state_data
) AS state_updated
